title: ISic004234. I.Sicily inscription 004234
body:
Facsimile Images

Κλωδίας
Ἀριστοβούλας

Apparatus criticus

Text of I.Lipara

English translation

(tomb) of Klodia Aristoboula

commentary

I.Lipara observes that the inscription pertains to the re-use of the stele, which was probably originally anepigraphic.

bibliography

  • 695 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
